name: Kidnapped
description:
Welcome to the world of intrigue and suspense! In this thrilling mystery game, you will step into the shoes of a brilliant detective summoned to solve the high-stakes kidnapping of the beloved actress Sebastiana Sax. You will analyze clues, interrogate suspects, and piece together evidence to uncover the identity of the sinister kidnapper and their hidden motive.

As you delve deeper into the case, you'll encounter a web of secrets and lies that will challenge your investigative skills and keep you on the edge of your seat. Time is running out, and the clock is ticking. Can you solve the mystery and rescue Sebastiana Sax before it's too late? Put your detective skills to the test, and play now to find out!
